name: Goblin Raid (Prototypex87)
description:
Raid a Human Village as a band of goblins, cause Mayhem and wreck up the place.

CONTROLS: 

Click on the active goblin to pass turn.

Click a blue square to move the active goblin.

Click a red square to attack with active goblin.

Smash things to earn Mischief karma, use this to upgrade goblin hp between raids.

Kill people and animals to earn Evil karma, use this to upgrade goblin attack bteween raids.

If all your goblins die you lose.

Music:

'Goblin smash' by Benjamin Bublitz
